data.text: @Francin63465122 If your portable translator is run by lithium batteries, you may carry it onboard and use it to communicate with our crew :) - Liz

@Francin63465122 We are afraid not :( Our crew and airport staff will try their best to assist you, no worries.
- Liz

@Francin63465122 Hi there, if your portable translator is run by lithium batteries, you may carry it onboard (check-in baggage is not allowed)  Meanwhile, our staff will try their best for assist, no worries :)
 - Liz
